title: 游戏非正常退出
author: xueconghui
txt_content:
这怎么办啊？电脑升到64位后游戏就打不开了。求大神帮助!






file_1549333514000.jpg
(74 KB, 下载次数: 0)




下载附件


2019-2-5 10:25 上传

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
xueconghui 发表于 2019-2-5 10:54
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// But it works on my machine.
驱动问题，baidu 升级驱动

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 把 .minecraft 文件夹中 crash-reports 文件夹中的最新文件发给我。

replies.author: xueconghui
replies.txt_content:
